sentences.english: Her parents betrothed her to the boy of the neighboring village.
sentences.chinese: 她父母在她年幼时就把她许配给邻村的一个小男孩。

sentences.english: Mothers usually only have custody while the children are young.
sentences.chinese: 母亲在子女年幼时通常只有监护权。
提供机会让孩子年幼时锻炼领导能力。

sentences.english: My father taught me to fish when I was a little boy.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲在我年幼时就教我钓鱼了。

sentences.english: As a child, what we've got more makes us recognize full of gratitude in our mind.
sentences.chinese: 年幼时获得越多的爱，成就我们知恩图报。

sentences.english: They were fed compulsively in petticoats and took the hormone.
sentences.chinese: 她们幼时被强迫喂食，并服用激素药物。

sentences.english: Viserys had told her all the tales when she was little.
sentences.chinese: 韦赛里斯在她幼时曾经告诉她所有的传说故事。

sentences.english: Of good upbringing; well-mannered and refined.
sentences.chinese: 他幼时受过很好的教养。

sentences.english: Hence, ice-sugar became my youth favorite, and only snacks.
sentences.chinese: 于是，冰糖成了我幼时最爱吃的，也是唯一的零食。

sentences.english: When women were babies, they enjoyed playing peek-a-boo with their fathers.
sentences.chinese: 在女人年幼时，她们很喜欢和父亲玩躲猫猫的游戏。

sentences.english: I used to have blonde hair when I was a kid.
sentences.chinese: 在我年幼时，我曾有一头金发。

sentences.english: I am very grateful to my first teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感谢蒙师在我年幼时给予我的教育。

sentences.english: Peduncles with sparse arachnoid tomentum when young, then gradually falling off.
sentences.chinese: 幼时的花序梗具具稀疏蛛丝状毛，然后逐渐从上落下。

sentences.english: She eloped with her childhood sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 她和她幼时的恋人私奔了。

sentences.english: Elegant doors first two were born in the family, was known to Expo will book group.
sentences.chinese: 两位都出生在书香门第的家庭，幼时便以博览群书。
